title: Fresh deploy retry via frontend build version bump + admin note about missing Publish URL

requirements.summary: Bump the frontend build version string to force a new build artifact and document the deploy retry outcome regarding the Publish URL / Open App link.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/buildInfo.ts` BUILD_VERSION is incremented from its current value to a new value (e.g., v33) to trigger a new build artifact.
A new build+deploy is executed after the version bump.

The resulting Caffeine deploy output includes a visible Publish URL / “Open App” link; if it is still missing, record the deploy attempt outcome for follow-up (error message or confirmation that deploy succeeded but URL did not appear).

file_operations.description: Increment BUILD_VERSION (currently 'v32') to a new value to force a fresh frontend build artifact for the next deploy attempt.
Add a short section/template to record the deploy retry outcome, including whether Caffeine showed a Publish URL / “Open App” link and any relevant deploy output if it remains missing.

requirements.summary: Add a concise admin-facing notice in the Admin Panel about the Caffeine UI sometimes not showing the Publish URL / Open App link after successful deploys.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin Panel contains a concise English notice about the potential Caffeine deploy UI issue (missing Publish URL / Open App) and the plan to retry later if it happens.
The notice does not change any business logic and does not block normal app usage.

file_operations.description: Create a small, admin-facing informational notice component. Use shadcn-ui (compose via existing UI primitives like Card/typography) to display a non-blocking message; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Render the new CaffeineDeployUiNotice near the top of the Admin Panel (above existing panels), ensuring it is informational only and does not affect any admin tools or app flows.
